column1: Chlordiazepoxide is a prescription medication used to treat certain anxiety disorders and symptoms of alcohol withdrawal.

Determine the following information: - Patient's age, weight, and condition - The name of the product (ingredients and strengths, if known) - When it was swallowed - The amount swallowed - If the medication was prescribed for the patient
Exceptions may include patients with aplastic anemia or those who overdose on many different substances.
